prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shiny, blue body and aquatic features.
I want a unique insectoid Pokemon that blends seamlessly into its wetland habitat.
Generate a Pokemon that has a bubble-like head and a vibrant green exoskeleton.
Make a small, cute spider Pokemon that can also swim effortlessly in water.
Imagine a Pokemon with large, expressive eyes and a playful personality.
Design an adorable, water-dwelling creature that has a distinct shell-like back.
Give me a tiny Pokemon with a mix of bug and water features, perfect for underwater exploration.
